attributes.action: Review the levels of sentencing for drink driving offences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like the goverment to review the levels of alcohol for drink drive offences and the sentencing that is given to indivdual offence cases.
The sentencing for drink driving offences carries a minimum time in comparisons to other criminal activities. 
Please could the goverment look into the possiblity of zero tolerence as there are drastic consquences for families of drink drivers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
